nodes.text: The Blue Ace was a custom-built starship piloted by Torra Doza. It could hold an astromech droid and was able to change the power of its laserblasts. Doza used it in several races, missions and helped defend the Colossus several times. It was also present at the Battle of Exegol between the Resistance and the Sith Eternal.

The Blue Ace first appeared in "The Recruit," the first episode of the first season of Star Wars Resistance. The episode was directed by Steward Lee and Saul Ruiz, written by Brandon Auman, and first aired on October 7, 2018.

The Blue Ace was among the many starships that made up the Citizens' fleet during the Battle of Exegol in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. A photo-realistic model of the ship was created for the film by Industrial Light & Magic.
